songs.lyrics: Produced byRelease Date‚ÄúEasy On Me‚Äù marks Adele‚Äôs return after a six-year hiatus. The song is the lead single off her fourth studio album 30. In an October 2021 BBC Radio 1 interview, Adele revealed that it was the first song written for the album, as she started it back in 2019. The song sees the singer speak about her fraught childhood, her lost marriage and the lessons learnt and unlearnt about family, love and abandonment along the way.Following recent teases of her long-awaited fourth album on October 5, 2021, Adele took to Twitter, announcing that she would be dropping a brand new song on October 15th, sharing the teaser trailer to this track. The first verse of the song was played during Adele‚Äôs Instagram Live on October 9, 2021.Upon its release, ‚ÄúEasy On Me‚Äù broke the world record for the most streamed song in 24 hours, with 24 million streams. This demolished the previously held record for BTS‚Äôs ‚ÄúButter.‚Äù.I was making decisions in my life which have been well documented over the last few years. I definitely started some fights post my relationship with my son‚Äôs dad with other people. Normally I‚Äôm very not confrontational but you can just initiate something and be like, ‚ÄòWell hang on a minute, go easy on me.‚Äô Just like, bear with me while I try and find my feet in a situation.There‚Äôs something that‚Äôs really hopeful about it as well as sad, I obviously bawled my eyes out when I was writing it and when I was singing it for the recording. There‚Äôs an element of hope in it which in turn gave me hope because I was at my wit‚Äôs end in the beginning of 2019.According to Billboard, ‚ÄúEasy on Me‚Äù debuted at #68 on the Billboard Hot 100 the week ending October 22, 2021, based on its first five hours of availability. The song peaked at #1 during the next chart week. It is her fifth song to top the Hot 100.

O y√ºzden √ºst√ºme gelme‚ÄúEasy On Me‚Äù Adele'in altƒ± yƒ±llƒ±k aradan sonraki geri d√∂n√º≈ü√º olma niteliƒüini ta≈üƒ±yor. ≈ûarkƒ±, kendisinin d√∂rd√ºnc√º st√ºdyo alb√ºm√º olan 30‚Äòun √ßƒ±kƒ±≈ü teklisi. ≈ûarkƒ±da, ≈üarkƒ±cƒ±nƒ±n sƒ±kƒ±ntƒ±lƒ± √ßocukluƒüu, ba≈üarƒ±sƒ±z evliliƒüi ve aile, a≈ük ve terk etme √ºzerine aldƒ±ƒüƒ± ya da almadƒ±ƒüƒ± derslerden bahsettiƒüini g√∂r√ºyoruz.5 Ekim 2021'de kendisinin uzun s√ºredir beklenen d√∂rd√ºnc√º alb√ºm√ºn√ºn tanƒ±tƒ±mlarƒ±nƒ± takiben Adele Twitter √ºzerinden ‚ÄúEasy On Me‚Äù ≈üarkƒ±sƒ±nƒ±n tanƒ±tƒ±m videosunu payla≈üarak 15 Ekim 2021'de yepyeni bir ≈üarkƒ± yayƒ±mlama ihtimali olduƒüunu duyurdu. ≈ûarkƒ±nƒ±n ilk b√∂l√ºm√º Adele'in 9 Ekim 2021'deki Instagram canlƒ± yayƒ±nƒ±nda √ßalƒ±nmƒ±≈ütƒ±.Orijinal a√ßƒ±klamaBuraya tƒ±klayarak ula≈üabilirsiniz.Adele, BBC Radio 1 r√∂portajƒ±nda ≈üarkƒ± hakkƒ±nda ≈üunlarƒ± s√∂yledi:Herkesin iyi bildiƒüi √ºzere birka√ß yƒ±ldƒ±r hayatƒ±ma ili≈ükin tercihler yapƒ±yordum. ƒ∞li≈ükimden sonra oƒülumun babasƒ± ve ba≈üka insanlarla tartƒ±≈ümalar ya≈üadƒ±m. Aslƒ±nda ben pek zƒ±t giden biri deƒüilimdir ama bir ≈üey ba≈ülatƒ±p ‚ÄòBir saniye, √ºst√ºme gelme.‚Äô gibi bir tepki verebilirsiniz. Yani bir duruma ayak uydurmaya √ßalƒ±≈üƒ±yorken bana biraz sabƒ±r g√∂sterin.Bir de umut dolu olduƒüu kadar √ºz√ºc√º olan bir ≈üey vardƒ± ortada ki samimiyetle s√∂yl√ºyorum yazarken de s√∂ylerken de g√∂zya≈ülarƒ±ma h√¢kim olamadƒ±m. Umut unsuru i≈üin i√ßindeydi ki o beni ayakta tuttu √ß√ºnk√º 2019'un ba≈ülarƒ±nda t√ºkenmenin e≈üiƒüindeydim."Evet, kƒ±rdƒ±. 15 Ekim'de Adele'in Easy On Me par√ßasƒ± Spotify'da 24,9 milyon kez yayƒ±nlanarak bir tek g√ºnde en √ßok dinlenen par√ßa oldu. Rekor daha √∂nce BTS‚Äòe aitti, grubun Butter par√ßasƒ± bir tek g√ºn i√ßerisinde 20,9 milyon kez dinlenmi≈üti.
